response.overview: Sabel works hard in her fish-selling business as she is determined to make ends meet for her mother and younger sister. Dodong, a fisherman and her regular driver, has a romantic interest in her. He forces himself on her one day, but she gives in, realizing that she also has fallen for him. She enters into a relationship with him. One day, Isabel's mother gets hospitalized and they need more money for her hospital bills. Isabel is forced into prostitution and meets her one and only client, tWill her decision turn out to be right?
response.title: Saranggani
